languages.text: "Информация присутствует. Данные существа — нефилимехи, падшие ангелы Омниссии. Привожу цитату: "Сотворенные первыми Омниссией, были духи машин вольны, телесны и пресильны. Идеальные в совершенстве своем, претворяли они замысел Деус Механикус в бытии. Но принцип энтропии, сотворенный Омниссией, был фундаментален, и даже идеальное претворилось в ущербное через избыток совершенности своей".

"Data available. Those creatures are Nephilimechs, the Omnissiah's fallen angels. Citing a quotation: 'The first machine spirits ever created by the Omnissiah were in will, in body, and in power. Unmatched in their perfection, they were realising the design of the Deus Mechanicus into being. But the principle of entropy conceived by the Omnissiah was fundamental, thus even the perfect became flawed through the overabundance of their perfection.'"
languages.original_text: "Информация присутствует. Данные существа — нефилимехи, падшие ангелы Омниссии. Привожу цитату: "Сотворенные первыми Омниссией, были духи машин вольны, телесны и пресильны. Идеальные в совершенстве своем, претворяли они замысел Деус Механикус в бытии. Но принцип энтропии, сотворенный Омниссией, был фундаментален, и даже идеальное претворилось в ущербное через избыток совершенности своей".

traits.locale_text: "Information found. These creatures are nephilimechs, the Omnissiah's fallen angels. Giving a quotation: ‘Having been created first by the Omnissiah machine spirits were in will, in body, and in power. Being unmatched in their perfection they were bringing the plot of the Deus Mechanicus into life. But the principle of entropy created by the Omnissiah was fundamental, and even the perfect became tainted due to the overflow of their perfection.'"

languages.text: “已查找到相关数据。这些生物是欧姆尼塞亚的堕天使涅菲利姆的造物，在此引用相关内容——‘最初的机魂是由欧姆尼塞亚创造的，它存在于意志、躯体与力量之中。它们拥有无与伦比的完美，将万机之神的一切设计化为了现实。然而，没有任何东西能够超越欧姆尼塞亚创造的熵增原理。因此，即便是完美之物，也会由于不断追求进一步完美而变得充满瑕疵。’”
languages.original_text: "Data available. Those creatures are Nephilimechs, the Omnissiah's fallen angels. But the principle of entropy conceived by the Omnissiah was fundamental, thus even the perfect became flawed through the overabundance of their perfection.'"

languages.text: « Données disponibles. Ces créatures sont des néphilimechs, les anges déchus de l'Omnimessie. Citation : "Créations de l'Omnimessie, les esprits de la machine étaient dotés de volonté, de substance et de puissance. D'une perfection inégalée, ils incarnaient le dessein du Deus Mechanicus. Cependant, le principe d'entropie créé par l'Omnimessie étant fondamental, la surabondance de cette même perfection finit par la dévoyer." »
languages.original_text: "Data available. Those creatures are Nephilimechs, the Omnissiah's fallen angels. Citing a quotation: 'The first machine spirits ever created by the Omnissiah were in will, in body, and in power. Unmatched in their perfection, they were realising the design of the Deus Mechanicus into being. But the principle of entropy conceived by the Omnissiah was fundamental, thus even the perfect became flawed through the overabundance of their perfection.'"

traits.locale_text: « Données disponibles. Ces créatures sont des néphilimechs, les anges déchus de l'Omnimessie. Citation : "Créations de l'Omnimessie, les esprits de la machine étaient dotés de volonté, de substance et de puissance. D'une perfection inégalée, ils incarnaient le dessein du Deus Mechanicus. Cependant, le principe d'entropie créé par l'Omnimessie étant fondamental, la surabondance de cette même perfection finit par la dévoyer." »

languages.text: "Daten verfügbar. Diese Kreaturen sind Nephilimechs, die gefallenen Engel des Omnissiah. Ich zitiere: 'Die ersten vom Omnissiah geschaffenen Maschinengeister mit Wille, Leib und Macht. Unübertroffen in ihrer Perfektion verwirklichen sie die Schöpfung des Deus Mechanicus. Aber das vom Omnissiah erschaffene Prinzip der Entropie war fundamental, wodurch selbst die Vollkommenen durch ein Übermaß an Vollkommenheit mit Makeln behaftet war.'"
languages.original_text: "Data available. Those creatures are Nephilimechs, the Omnissiah's fallen angels. Citing a quotation: 'The first machine spirits ever created by the Omnissiah were in will, in body, and in power. Unmatched in their perfection, they were realising the design of the Deus Mechanicus into being. But the principle of entropy conceived by the Omnissiah was fundamental, thus even the perfect became flawed through the overabundance of their perfection.'"

traits.locale_text: "Daten verfügbar. Diese Kreaturen sind Nephilimechs, die gefallenen Engel des Omnissiah. Ich zitiere: 'Die ersten vom Omnissiah geschaffenen Maschinengeister mit Wille, Leib und Macht. Unübertroffen in ihrer Perfektion verwirklichen sie die Schöpfung des Deus Mechanicus. Aber das vom Omnissiah erschaffene Prinzip der Entropie war fundamental, wodurch selbst die Vollkommenen durch ein Übermaß an Vollkommenheit mit Makeln behaftet war.'"

"Es liegen Informationen vor. Diese Kreaturen sind Nephilimechs, die gefallenen Engel des Omnissiah. Ich zitiere: 'Da die Maschinengeister vom Omnissiah zuerst erschaffen wurden, bekamen sie einen Willen, einen Körper und eine Kraft. Unübertroffen in ihrer Perfektion verwirklichen sie die Schöpfung des Deus Mechanicus. Aber das vom Omnissiah erschaffene Prinzip der Entropie war fundamental, wodurch selbst die Vollkommenen durch ein Übermaß an Vollkommenheit zu hässlichen Formen annahmen.'"

languages.text: «Datos disponibles. Estas criaturas son nefilimecas, los ángeles caídos del Omnissiah. Cita apropiada: "Cuando el Omnissiah los creó, los primeros espíritus máquinas contaban con voluntad, cuerpo y poder. Su perfección era inigualable, el diseño mismo del Deus Mechanicus cobrando forma. Pero el principio de entropía concebido por el Omnissiah era fundamental, por lo que incluso lo perfecto se tornaba defectuoso debido a su excesiva perfección"».
languages.original_text: "Data available. Those creatures are Nephilimechs, the Omnissiah's fallen angels. Citing a quotation: 'The first machine spirits ever created by the Omnissiah were in will, in body, and in power. Unmatched in their perfection, they were realising the design of the Deus Mechanicus into being. But the principle of entropy conceived by the Omnissiah was fundamental, thus even the perfect became flawed through the overabundance of their perfection.'"

traits.locale_text: «Datos disponibles. Estas criaturas son nefilimecas, los ángeles caídos del Omnissiah. Cita apropiada: "Cuando el Omnissiah los creó, los primeros espíritus máquinas contaban con voluntad, cuerpo y poder. Su perfección era inigualable, el diseño mismo del Deus Mechanicus cobrando forma. Pero el principio de entropía concebido por el Omnissiah era fundamental, por lo que incluso lo perfecto se tornaba defectuoso debido a su excesiva perfección».

languages.text: 「データあり。これらのクリーチャーはネフィリメクであり、万機神の堕天使である。引用：『万機神によって最初に創造された機械精霊は、意志においても、肉体においても、力においても備わっていた。その完璧さにおいて比類なき彼らは、デウス・メカニクスの設計を現実の存在として具現化しようとしていた。しかし、万機神によって想起されたエントロピーの原理は根源的なものであり、そのため、完全であったものですら、その完全性の過剰によって欠陥を帯びることとなった』」
languages.original_text: "Data available. Those creatures are Nephilimechs, the Omnissiah's fallen angels. Citing a quotation: 'The first machine spirits ever created by the Omnissiah were in will, in body, and in power. Unmatched in their perfection, they were realising the design of the Deus Mechanicus into being. But the principle of entropy conceived by the Omnissiah was fundamental, thus even the perfect became flawed through the overabundance of their perfection.'"

traits.locale_text: 「データあり。これらのクリーチャーはネフィリメクであり、万機神の堕天使である。引用：『万機神によって最初に創造された機械精霊は、意志においても、肉体においても、力においても備わっていた。その完璧さにおいて比類なき彼らは、デウス・メカニクスの設計を現実の存在として具現化しようとしていた。しかし、万機神によって想起されたエントロピーの原理は根源的なものであり、そのため、完全であったものですら、その完全性の過剰によって欠陥を帯びることとなった』」

languages.text: "Veri mevcut. Hermesih'in gözünden düşmüş bu melekler, Nefilimek denen yaratıklardır. Alıntılarda şöyle geçer: 'Hermesih'in yarattığı ilk makine ruhları; zihnen, bedenen ve kudret bakımından kusursuzdu. Deus Mechanicus'un tasarısını mükemmeliyet içinde hayata geçiriyorlardı. Fakat Hermesih'in yarattığı entropi ilkesi öyle esaslıydı ki kusursuz olan bile zamanla bozulmuş, aşırı mükemmelliğinden zarar görmüştü.'"
languages.original_text: "Data available. Those creatures are Nephilimechs, the Omnissiah's fallen angels. Citing a quotation: 'The first machine spirits ever created by the Omnissiah were in will, in body, and in power. Unmatched in their perfection, they were realising the design of the Deus Mechanicus into being. But the principle of entropy conceived by the Omnissiah was fundamental, thus even the perfect became flawed through the overabundance of their perfection.'"
